subject: Re: Gravity forms with Mailchimp and staging site

Hi Ella,

Happy new year and I hope you enjoyed the break as well.

We have updated the staging site with the latest copy of the live site. Please see the link below, use your own details on the live site.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and team,

Happy new year, hope you have had a good holiday break.

We are trying to create a simple newsletter sign up for each of our different Royal Rehab LifeWorks sites. We see this sitting just above the footer as an option for people to keep in touch when they are not ready to make a referral yet.

We would like the information from the form to go directly into a new list in mailchimp and so would like to integrate the gravity form with mailchimp. When I look at gravity forms we don't see to have an option to use the add on mailchimp - which is one of the plugins.

Please can you take a look into why this is the case?

Also is it possible to have a staging site so we can work on these and other changes without doing this on the live site. We would want to make sure everything is working on mobile and desktop before we push new updates lives as best practice and make sure there are no theme or plugin conflicts etc.

Please give me a call if you would like to discuss this further.

Thanks
Ella

Ella Girling​​​​

Marketing Manager

M 0403 168 643

|

E ella.girling@royalrehab.com.au

Suite 10.01, Level 10, 52 Alfred St Milsons Point NSW 2061

royalrehabgroup.com.au
